cause.description:
Established in 2001, the Sigma Lambda Beta Educational Foundation is a charitable and educational 501(c)3 tax-exempt organization, separate and independent from Sigma Lambda Beta Fraternity. The Education Foundation is supported by tax-deductible charitable gifts from loyal members and friends of Sigma Lambda Beta Fraternity. It receives, manages and distributes endowment gifts, deferred gifts, annual gifts, and special gifts for the purpose of funding educational and leadership development programs for Sigma Lambda Beta Fraternity, as well as direct financial assistance for undergraduate and graduate student members.
The Education Foundation is governed by a board of trustees composed primarily of alumni of Sigma Lambda Beta Fraternity. Our staff located in North Liberty, IA. conducts our daily operations.
If you have any questions about the Sigma Lambda Beta Education Foundation, please email us at thelight@slbfoundation.com.
1. We must increase the access to higher education.
2. As a young foundation, associated with a young fraternity, we must build the base for the future success of the organizations.
3. The type of educational support and programming that we can do is only limited by the amount generously donated by our alumni, family, and friends.
